Articles.Content:
You go up 1 level. You find nothing.

Except Chuck Norris again. He was bored so he only threw you up one level.

You find a large mass of Star Trek fans and replica machinery. They are apparently trying to test a warp-drive

You

A) Help them.

You end up one level higher, but with only 1 arm. They blame temporal anomalies

Help them, but you instead put boosters on it.

They overheat while one of them unmasks, showing he is Jebediah himself

C) RUN!!!!!!!

The antimatter explosion which ensues gets you 2 levels higher

D) You put on sunglasses and enjoy the view.

It was great, too bad there was no popcorn and you only know how to speak Klingon now

You go to 47.

You find a poster advertising Silisko Industries.

you go back down one level.

You find NovaSilisko itself.
47. You find this words: Why do we need to find something at every stage ???

You go to level 48...

Everything turns Hi-Tech and Nano-techy, and awesome.

You go to level 48...

Everything turns Hi-Tech and Nano-techy, and awesome.

You go to 49 and discover three unhappy men camping like medival peasants.

TopGear reference FTW.

You go to 49 and discover three unhappy men camping like medival peasants.

TopGear reference FTW.

You go to level 50 and because of nano-tech there is a 1 km2 huge resort with awesome water effects...

You go to the bar and request a Sundae

You enjoy your sundae on the way to 51.

You get mistaken for a ballistics racer and get told to get in the supersonic car.

Look up ballistics game on YouTube. It\'s awesome.

You get to Level 52.

You finally find the lift. The doorway has been covered in \'CRIME SCENE - DO NOT CROSS\' tape and a small sign has been blu-tacked to it which reads \'OUT OF ORDER - SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE\'. Not wishing to see why the doorway has been covered in \'CRIME SCENE - DO NOT CROSS\' tape, you ignore the lift, and go back to the stairwell.

You get to level 53...

It\'s a tester lab for Alienwareâ„¢Â©Â® pc\'s.

They give you the opportunity to play all the games...

After a week you continue your way upwards...
You find level 54. It\'s pitch black, and you trip on a carefully placed rake.

You find level 54. It\'s pitch black, and you trip on a carefully placed rake.

You decide the rake may be useful, and take it with you to Level 56.
... On level 56 (you can\'t go up any faster because of your fall on level 54) you decide to farm the concrete delusionally because the sundae you had on level 51 was drugged.

You fall down the stairs by two floors, but because of the rules of this game, when you open the stairwell door to Level 52, you find yourself walking into Level 53.

MINDBENDER
You go to level 53, and you see Clippy and he says: It looks you will go a level up. Do you want assistance?

You punch him in his steel nuts and run up one level (54).

You see a mini Pandora (Avatar) and you go and have some alien weed.

Drugs are bad kids...
you go to 55 and defuse the bomb and kill all the others in a game of search, and you rech the rank of 34, prestige 4.
Go to level 56. You think how funny it would be if it were the 69th floor.
In level 57 you find Nova trying to shoot Pegasi with a flak cannon

You climb the stairs to level 58 and then trip on a thin wire stretched across the stairwell door. This casues a mallet to fall on your head.

You wake up and you\'re on level 57... still.
You go to floor 58 and eat some peanuts.
You run out of peanuts on level 58 so you climb to 59 to get some more.

You grab some peanuts, then limp up the stairs to level 60. On level 60, the movie Microsoft Word: Return of Clippy plays constantly, and a dark, camo Clippy comes out for revenge for your actions against him back on level 53.
Clippy punches you up the next flight of stairs and as you try to escape, you run into a steel bar placed at groin level... You think 'Today has not been my luckiest...'
You go back down to level 1, you find Russian Dancing Ponies.
